isosensitivity: ISO 100 to 1600              in steps of 1 EV. Can also be set to approx. 1 EV above ISO 1600 (ISO              3200 equivalent), auto ISOsensitivity control available(Recommended              Exposure Index)
lcdmonitor: 3-in., approx. 230 k-dot TFT LCD with brightness adjustment
frameadvancerate: Up to 3 fps (manual focus, mode M or S, shutter speed 1/250 s or faster and other settings at default values)
exposurecompensation: -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashmode: Auto, auto with              red-eye reduction, fill-flash, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with              red-eye correction and rear curtain with slow sync
storagefilesystem: DCF (Design              Rule for Camera File System) 2.0, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format),              Exif 2.21 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras),              PictBridge
exposuremeteringmethod: Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8-mm circle in center of frame Spot: Meters 3.5-mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
viewfindermagnification: Approx. 0.8 x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m-1)
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced              Wireless Lighting supported with SB-900, SB-800, or SU-800 as              commander; Flash Color Information Communication supported with              built-in flash and all CLS-compatible flash units
playbackfunction: Full-frame              and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) playback with playback              zoom, playback of stop-motion movies created with D3000, slide show,              histogram display, highlights, auto image rotation and image comment              (up to 36 characters)
selftimer: Can be selected from 2, 5, 10 and 20 s duration
audiovideooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL              balanced fill-flash and standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR using              420-pixel RGB sensor are available with built-in flash and SB-900,              SB-800, SB-600, or SB-400 (i-TTL balanced fill-flash is available when              matrix or center-weighted metering is selected) Auto aperture: Available with SB-900/SB-800 and CPU lens Non-TTL auto: Supported flash units include SB-900, SB-800, SB-80DX, SB-28DX, SB-28, SB-27 and SB-22S Range-priority manual: Available with SB-900 and SB-800
autofocus: Nikon Multi-CAM 1000              autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection, 11 focus points              (including one crosstype sensor) and AF-assist illuminator (range              approx. 1 ft. 8 in. to 9 ft. 10 in. / 0.5 to 3m)
focuspoint: Can be selected from 11 focus points
storagefileformat: NEF (RAW) JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx. 1:4), normal (approx. 1:8), or basic (approx. 1:16)compression NEF (RAW) + JPEG: Single photograph recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG formats
releasemode: Single Frame Continuous Self-Timer Quick-Response Remote Delayed Remote
picturecontrolsystem: Can be selected from Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (Single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-Lbutton
cameraweight: Approx. 1 lb. 1.1 oz. (485 g) without battery, memory card, or body cap
focuslensservo: Autofocus              (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); continuous-servo AF (AF-C); auto              AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A);predictive focus tracking activated              automatically according to subject status Manual focus (MF): Electronic rangefinder can be used
acadapter: AC Adapter EH-5a; requires Power Connector EP-5 (optional)
activedlighting: Can be selected from On or Off
flashaccessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
shutterspeed: 1/4000 to 30 s in steps of 1/3 EV, Bulb, Time (requires optional Wireless Remote Control ML-L3)
exposuremetering: TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
supportedlanguages: Chinese              (Simplified and Traditional), Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French,              German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese,              Russian, Spanish, Swedish
shutterflashsyncspeed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/200 s or slower
builtinflash: Auto, Portrait, Child, Close-up, Night portrait: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M: Manual pop-up with button release
exposurerange: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0 to 20 EV Spot metering: 2 to 20 EV (ISO 100, f/1.4 lens, 68Â°F/20Â°C)
exposuremodes: Auto modes              (auto, auto [flash off ]), Scene Modes (Portrait, Landscape, Child,              Sports, Close up, Night portrait),programmed auto with flexible program              (P), shutter-priority auto (S), aperture-priority auto (A), manual (M)
storagemedia: SD (Secure Digital) memory cards, SDHC compliant
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
flashreadyindicator: Lights              when built-in flash or optional flash unit such as SB-900, SB-800,              SB-600, SB-400, SB-80DX, SB-28DX, or SB-50DX is fully charged; blinks              for 3 s after flash is fired at full output
whitebalance: Auto,              incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy,              shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine turning.
